results.overview: Ryan and Jennifer are opposites who definitely do not attract. At least that's what they always believed. When they met as twelve-year-olds, they disliked one another. When they met again as teenagers, they loathed each other. But when they meet in college, the uptight Ryan and the free-spirited Jennifer find that their differences bind them together and a rare friendship develops.
results.title: Boys and Girls

results.overview: Boys and Girls is a 1983 Canadian short film directed by Don McBrearty. It is based on Alice Munro's short story of the same name, written in 1968. It is a coming of age story about a girl growing up on a farm having to accept that in her lifetime she will always be considered "only a girl." The film won an Oscar in 1984 for Best Short Subject.
results.title: Boys and Girls

results.overview: A birdwatching trip inspires Max to ask questions about the different expectations we have for boys and girls. His friend Moira helps him challenge what we think it means to be a boy by teaching him a few ballet moves.
results.title: Friends of Mine: “Boys and Girls”

results.original_title: Queer Boys and Girls on the Shinkansen
results.overview: Queer Boys and Girls on the Shinkansen brings together ten filmmakers and artists who consistently affirm what it means to be gay or lesbian in their work. Habakari chose ten filmmakers to make a five-minute work each, developed around a gay or lesbian theme, and compiled the resulting shorts in random order to create this omnibus film. The result is a queer film, by queer filmmakers, for a queer audience. Each short is its own short story, and the styles range from drama and experimental film and animation.
results.title: Queer Boys and Girls on the Shinkansen

results.original_title: Night Shall Eat These Boys and Girls
results.overview: A black and white short film about a rambunctious teenager who hangs out in graveyards and reads poetry
results.title: Night Shall Eat These Boys and Girls

results.overview: Ten young people (six boys and four girls), most of whom students, rent a house in bad repair and set about living together. The experience is not obvious and the ten tenants have to cope with more than one difficulty. But they also have their moments. Things really go awry when Françoise, an unmarried girl, is forced to deliver the baby she carries prematurely and when Solange, the lonely girl of the group, attempts suicide. Shortly afterwards, the group learns that the house is due for demolition. They decide to take advantage of this opportunity to face adult life individually.
results.title: Boys and Girls

results.original_title: Storia di ragazzi e di ragazze
results.overview: At a farmhouse, a large family cooks mountains of food for the next day's engagement party for Silvia and her city fiancé, Angelo. Her parents feud about infidelity; an aging salesman who rents a cottage from them arrives with a young French woman; in Bologna, Angelo's mother frets that her son is marrying beneath him; his sisters are less critical. Early the next morning, the four of them go by train to the farmhouse, joined by Angelo's married, unpregnant sister. The day-long dinner is riotous, couples display affection and impatience, children chase angels. Angelo's family stays the night, and his sister Linda has a visitor. A silver elephant makes the perfect gift.
results.title: The Story of Boys and Girls

results.overview: This sex education movie explore themes of body development, sexual hygiene, masturbation, menstruation, puberty, sex and giving birth.
results.title: Puberty: Sexual Education For Boys and Girls

results.overview: A Shaw Brothers comedy starring Margaret Tu Chuan and Paul Chang Chung,
results.title: Oh Boys! Oh Girls!

results.overview: A documentary which depicts the life of Bassem Samra and his friends and family. The film discusses issues concerning love and the veil.
results.title: On Boys, Girls and the Veil

results.overview: A boy transfers into a new high school in the big city. He gets bullied, but meets a pretty girl. He tries to win her heart, but rivals abound. Debut video release from Pantsu no ana, a subsection of "BOMB" magazine.
results.title: Boys Meet Girls

results.original_title: 乙女はお姉さま[ボク]に恋してる
results.overview: Short combining the storyline of Cinderella and Snow White (chibi style) with the "Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru" cast.
results.title: Otome wa Boku ni Koishiteru Special

results.original_title: パンツの穴　花柄畑でインプット
results.overview: Aoba Gakuen 3rd grade B group Taro, Daisuke, Makoto are very close friends and classic horny teens. We follow them as they stalk their crushes in a variety of ways.
results.title: Boys Meet Girls

results.overview: When camps around the country were shutting down every year and Camp Kitchikewana made the economically necessary move to turn co-ed, the result was a very real clash of the sexes.
results.title: Boys vs. Girls

results.overview: Bollywood 2012
results.title: Cool Boys Hot Girls

results.original_title: 地球外少年少女 前編
results.overview: In the year 2045, where the Internet and AI are commonplace even in space, and centers on a group of children stranded in space after a large-scale accident occurs in a space station. By using narrowband, social networking, and a drone that they can manipulate through smartphones and low-intelligence AI, they overcome many crises.
results.title: Extra-Terrestrial Boys & Girls: Part 1

results.original_title: The Boys & Girls Guide to Getting Down
results.overview: Tongue-in-cheek look at 20-something singles clubbing and partying in L.A. Voice-over narration, charts and graphs, and visits to a research laboratory punctuate the story of a single night when groups of friends go out, drink alcohol, take drugs, dance and talk, and look for someone to go home with.
results.title: The Boys & Girls Guide to Getting Down

results.overview: A dark comedy about a gay couple trying to adopt a newborn from a drug-addict and her abusive girlfriend.
results.title: Boy Boy Girl Girl

results.original_title: 地球外少年少女 後編
results.overview: In the year 2045, where the Internet and AI are commonplace even in space, and centers on a group of children stranded in space after a large-scale accident occurs in a space station. By using narrowband, social networking, and a drone that they can manipulate through smartphones and low-intelligence AI, they overcome many crises.
results.title: Extra-Terrestrial Boys & Girls: Part 2

results.overview: Young and attractive Keith and Marion are getting ready at home for a date, but they aren't planning on meeting each other: they're meeting someone of the same gender.
results.title: Boys & Girls
